comment: She is an ok teacher but if you miss class twice then you start losing points off your final grade, and eventually if you miss a certain amount of classes, meaning only 5, she automatically fails you for the class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: She gives a lot of little assignments, but none of it is hard. She gave us quizzes the entire semester as opposed to big tests. She did make us run and actually work out. She's funny and tried to keep the lectures interesting.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Hilarious--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: People who say she a bad prof or mean didn't try in her class at all or are heartless. She is awesome. Attendance is mandatory, you get like 2 day until it affects your grade. all of the work is on an online platform. you need to PAY ATTENTION to the due dates because she doesn't accept late work. She hilarious and a great teacher. TAKE HER!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Good professor. Took her for WELL1000 but that wasn't listed for some reason. No midterm or final this semester. You're graded on an online interface with weekly modules (they're incredibly easy). She is involved in class and keeps discussion going.
rating_tags: Respected--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I loved Professor McGowan. Her lectures are actually really interesting and she made them fun. Show up to class and do the online coursework and it's an easy A. There are 3 dress out/activity days that are very easy. Watch out for deadlines because she doesn't accept late work. Very good professor who knows what she is talking about.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Show up to class and do all of the online activities and you will probably make a high A. Make sure to know the due dates of some assignments because they can sneak up on you but other than that its a very easy class. There was only 3 dress out/activity days that were all very easy. She talked about "running the mile" all semester, but you can walk
rating_tags: Hilarious--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I don't know why she's rated so poorly.. class is mostly talking about subjects and her asking our opinion. Lecture is actually interesting especially the end of the semester. NOT hard work at all!!! just show up and turn things in on time and you'll pass
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Acts one way to your face and different way when grading your papers and deciding your final grade. Painfully difficult midterm and final. There is extra credit offered. After working my butt off, studying hard, and doing all the extra credit (including running a 5k) she still gave me an 89.4.

She is good when it comes to teaching the material, however she tends to speed over a lot of important information, then gives a painfully specific midterm and final. For a class that most people take just as a core class requirement, she does make it a bit harder than it needs to be for anyone that has no interest the subject.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Okay this class is not that hard at all. Do everything on time, actually read the chapters with the power point, do good enough on midterm and final, and be involved in class and you will be good. I almost failed my midterm but studied hard for final and got an 88. Finished with an A. Shes very funny and makes class interesting. Take her its easy
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--Hilarious--Clear grading criteria

comment: I loved having her as a professor. Shes real, shoots straight, and does a great job explaining. What made this course "hard" was how easy it was to throw your grade away on accident. Deadlines are solid and excuses are not acceptable. As a result, your grade can be hurt easy. Missing class will count against you too. Anything done follows syllabus
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Not sure why she has such a bad rating... She's just very straight up. Come to class, get your work done, and you'll be fine. I had her for my first semester of college and I didn't struggle at all. I finished with an A, and I'm not the best student ever. Don't be so uptight and interact in class and you'll be fine.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: YOU WILL NOT PASS UNLESS YOU ARE A TEACHERS PET! She is awful. She is not good teacher. No wonder her brother wants nothing to do with her, complained about him during lectures, awful, pointless , she discusses nothing that is on her exams, WILL NOT RESPOND TO YOUR EMAILS. SHE DOES NOT CARE ABOUT THE STUDENTS !!!!! TAKE ONLINE SHE IS HORRIBLE
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Do not take her as a wellness professor. Wellness is supposed to be an easy A and this was the farthest thing from that. She makes the midterm and final difficult and more work than they should actually be. You can only miss 2 classes before your grade goes down as well. She also doesn't accept late work. Do NOT take her, just don't.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Her grading is  ridiculous for the type of assignments that there are. You think you put in a lot of work on something and she will still find something wrong with it. And don't bother asking her about a grade you got on an assignment bc she wont give you respect or hear you out. Im a good student and put work in. Take online.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Ms. McGowan is what I like to call tough (kind of), but fair. She is quite a personality and makes the class interesting no matter what. I figured it would just be a health class, but I was wrong. Her grading can be certain on some things, but she doesn't make it impossible to pass, not even close. This will be an enjoyable experience if you work.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: She's a tough grader when it comes to the module check ins, but its tons of other things to make up for those assignments. Start on the check ins early in case you have questions, because she is very specific. You don't have to take notes, I really don't see the point in coming to class, but its mandatory.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She's very nitpicky with grading. Also get ready to exercise. You definitely have to work for your grade.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: I don't even know where to start. She's the worst teacher I ever had!! She wants to see you fail. Do not take this Class. Take it online. She disrespectful, childish, and she don't listen to peoples concerns. Take it online!!
rating_tags: Tough Grader

comment: This was by far my favorite class of college; not so much because of the wellness but because of Mcgowen. She is the funniest person with the best sense of humor and there is barely any work. Everything is basically online through bearface where you omplete moduels; if you put in the effort and work it's an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Very tough grader and never really clear on what she marks off on, sometime if you ask her why she took off she won't even know. Also a very rude induvidual and not good at teaching in the slightest
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Great professor all over! She doesn't ask for much just to do the module check ins and dress out maybe 3 or 4 times in the whole semester. Everything is basically online and is easy to use! Would recommend to anyone!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: No matter the work you do, she will find fault with it. I do not recommend this Professor. Tough grader, unclear schedules. Changes plans without notice. Pay attention to emails. Do not miss more than 2 classes, you will lose a whole letter grade. No matter the circumstances. Take someone else.

Professor McGowan is not terrible, she is just very straightforward and does not sugarcoat anything, which isn't something to take personally. All work is online, no tests. She is a tough grader but the work isn't really hard. She takes off a letter grade after you miss 3 classes. Not a bad class but you actually have to put in effort
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Dont ever take out your phone in her class, she will get really mad. Other than that, overall shes a good professor. Funny and sarcastic. Attendance counts and will drop your grade. Most of course is on Bearface (Online). A few in class activities and on the days you dress out, get ready to sweat fr bc it gets intense.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Basically everything is on bearface and if you don't have everything perfect she counts you off on your module check ins. She also belittles you when you ask a question so I stopped asking questions. She hates when you have your phone out. Lectures are pretty boring unless you like talking about how to be healthy. TAKE IT ONLINE!!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: The assigments are extensive BUT she does not give tests or quizzes, at least when I had her last year she didn't. Her "dress-out" days are actually pretty fun, the activities aren't boring and she is pretty funny. Some kids really didn't like her in my class, but they didn't try very hard either. Just do your work and be respectful & it's not bad

Professor McGowan is a tough grader when it comes to her modules. Achieving an A in her class is not impossible and not extremely difficult to achieve. But she is somewhat rude to students and needs to calm down a bit. She is really funny and I enjoyed the conversations we had in our class discussions.

This was part of my learning community and I got an A but I never missed class.  Everything is basically online, you read the modules and write up Healthy Living Reports.  You set a health goal and then you have to write about strategies to complete it, for ex:  I want to lose 15 pounds... u can get an A but expect to do some work.

The grading system relies almost entirely on homework through an incredibly confusing online textbook. Only reason to even show up is because you're marked down a letter grade after two unexcused absences. If it wasn't for the calendar at the textbook homepage of when assignments are due, then I'm not sure if I would have passed. She's rude too.
Very rude most of the time. She is very opinionated, there is soooooooooo much random work in her class its not even funny. All work is online and the system is terrible. STAY AWAY!!!

She grades very, very hard and can be very rude, but sometimes funny.  Her homework assignments are tough. No phones or she will yell at you. Do not fall asleep in her class or she will throw a pen or something at you. I would not take her again.

She grades very, very hard and can be very rude, but sometimes funny. Although there are no tests or quizzes throughout the entire semester, her homework assignments are tough. No phones or she will yell at you. Do not fall asleep in her class or she will throw a pen or something at you. I would not take her again.

Hands down my favorite professor this semester! I don't know why ppl don't enjoy the class. great discussions, good topics. She's funny, and can keep up with students. Just don't fall asleep or let her catch you with your phone... YOU WILL BE EMBARRASSED!

She is a hilarious teacher, and keeps lectures as interesting as she can. The class itself requires a lot of homework, but no tests or quizzes. She explains things well, but can be a tough grader. Gives extra credit

All online with some in class projects. Doesnt grade well, ,lets the website do it for you. hard to tell your grade during the semester because its not posted anywhere, kinda rude when you ask for help, don't text in class!

This class requires SERIOUS time and effort. Really? this class  is a KSU  requirement and it was the most work for me of the semester. She takes off points for  stupid reasons on most  assignments. I did all of my work and still only made a C in the class. I did not however do the activity's which accounts for 60 points. In my defense gym is close

This was the worst class ever! I read the chapters, went over the slides, and took notes AND STILL managed to fail every test we took. She's a nice woman but she won't accept late work no matter what the circumstances are and gives the hardest tests ever. This class was way too hard for a gen ed, and totally killed my GPA.

If you are looking for an easy HPS class (like they all should be) I would not take this teacher. She grades as if she is a graduate level teacher and she does not care if you pass or not. She counts off for the dumbest things on everything and rarely will give you a 100 on an assignment.
She takes the class way too seriously. Not much fun at all.

Although Professor McGowan can be pretty rude to her students, she can also be pretty funny at times. As long as you complete ALL assignments, you are eligable for extra credit for up to 50 points (Class has 1040-1060 total). Tests are very hard if you don't study. If you do study, and WELL, you should make at least a B. I wouldn't recommend her.

McGowan was not the worst teacher but she was the most blunt. She will call you out for absolutely anything she does not like. Don't let her see your phone! She is also very rude. Her tests were pretty easy as long as you study! Overall not very bad but she is just not the best.
She is a good professor. Assignments are not hard but tests are extremely difficult.

McGowan has sarcastic humor & really does not care about your learning. She is one of those instructors that believes her students cannot earn 100%. Her TESTS are unnecessarily CONFUSING & DECEITFUL. She teaches like this is a 3000 level course instead of a 1000 level. Most of TEST questions don't reflect the course's objectives. AVOID HER CLASSES

I made an account just to review this professor. Before I selected her, she had only 2 reviews. After this semester, she now has 16. All but one are negative, this should be enough to make you not choose her. I ignored the negative reviews, chose her anyway, and was very disappointed with the class. It was unnecessarily confusing and difficult.

She was cool as a person, and pretty funny, but she was a god-awful teacher. I had more useless labs in this class than combined assignments in all my others. She makes tests extremely difficult. She changes due dates often, making it hard to keep up with them all. I would NOT recommend taking her class to anyone.

This class is not that hard. I'm not sure why everyone is saying she's terrible and so is the class. She is a hilariously sarcastic woman. She does give a lot of work but none of it is extremely difficult. Tests aren't that easy if you don't study. If you don't want to do the physical activities required in this class then don't take it.

Please make other arrangements if U find yourself taking this professor. She's just inconsistent. Her syllabus was "revised" several times, making it hard 2 keep up with assignment due dates, dress out days, etc. Her tests R hard because she purposely tries to "trick you up." I did more work in that 1 class than all my other 4 classes combined.

She has a good sense of humor, but thats about it. She changed dates constantly, counted off points for the smallest of things, and was unclear all the time. I would avoid at all costs. She takes this as an anatomy class, not a HPS 1000 class.
her tests are hard and she words things in a confusing way sometimes. there are lots of labs. she also changes when stuff is due a lot

This class was horrible! She changes due dates all the time and gets you confused. She takes 2 weeks to reply to e-mails and gets really impatient and is short tempered. It's like she's on her period everday.Her tests are super hard. It doesn't even help if you attend class everyday and study because you will fail in the end. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS.

This is a terrible class. I really wish i hadn't have taken it. It is way too much work for a Gen Ed Class. Her tests are difficult even if you attend class and study. She is constantly changing due dates. She expects way too much for a Gen Ed class and counts off on  assignments for I don't even know what. She is sorta nice, but please avoid!
dont take this class... just dont

she is not nice wat so ever and makes you do activities without doing them herself. shes always complaining about something and has a bad attitude towards the class. she makes the boys take off their hats but lets the females in the class leave them on... like srsly not fair. its her way or the highway

This class required far too much work for a gen-ed class as everyone else has said. The tests aren't exactly difficult, but you have to spend way too much time studying to get a good grade considering the course. Expecting students to wear a pedometer for 6 weeks is plainly ridiculous. Avoid at all costs. This class requires too much time. Avoid.
Avoid Avoid Avoid.

I had this professor for the KSU Be the Change 1121 class, she made it horrible! She is not clear with her directions, and constantly changes assignments. She changes her schedule/syllabus all the time, and everyone ends up confused. For a college class, a professor should at least be able to keep their own directions straight!
Stay away.don't even try to take her class. She thins it's a biology rather than fitness for living.I really want to drop this class but it will affect my GPA. The worst professor I've had so far.

Absolutely the worst teacher I have encountered in my life. I submit full assignments on time based on personal info such as my heart rate and she somehow finds a way to take points off. The only reason I have not withdrawn is that I could not live on campus if I lost those class hours.

Avoid this professor at all costs. She requires WAY too much work for just a Gen-Ed class. She never responds to any e-mails you send to her. This was incredibly frustrating to me and everyone else in the class. I got an A in the class, but had to work extremely hard to get it. Take anyone else!!

This professor was hard.  She taught the class as if every student wanted to be a doctor.  She loved to hear herself talk. She was unclear with her directions and she required way too much work for a GenEd HPS class.  She was aweful. Do not take this professor.  This was the worst class I have taken at this University.
